description.message: Capture visible content of a tab, a region of a web page, or the whole page as a PNG image. Support horizontal and vertical scroll when capturing whole page.

tipStep1.message: Below is the screenshot you captured. You can edit it with the tools on the left. Press Done when finished.

tipStep2.message: Now you can right-click the image below and save it, or simply click on the Save button on the right.

border.message: Draw border only for highlighted area

tip1.message: Please refresh this page to perform screen capture actions.

tip2.message: This is a special page. Unable to perform screen capture actions on this page.
